author: Camryn Justice
title: Gov. Mike DeWine orders flags at half-staff to honor Ohio marine killed during NATO drill

author: Maeve Walsh
title: DeWine orders flags at half-staff to honor Guernsey County Marine

sentence: In addition to his honor, Governor Mike DeWine ordered that flags of the United States and the State of Ohio be flown at half-staff throughout Guernsey County as well as the Ohio Statehouse until the day of Sergeant Speedyâ€™s funeral, Saturday, April 9th.
author: Kailan Martin
title: Body of Ohio Marine Gunnery Sergeant James Speedy Returns Home
